message.raw:
Replaced __repr__ method of unit-values with default behavior, and instead
fall back on _repr_pretty_ in IPython displaying unit information. This is
to avoid breaking common libraries that assume that assume that __repr__ of
primitives will always just produce the primitive value.

Also fixed a problem with mzXML iteration that prevented it from working on
correctly ordered but un-nested scans.

message:
